To cancel an open order using the Ndax mobile app, follow these steps:
1. Log in to the Ndax mobile app. 2. Tap the Markets icon on the bottom left (it looks like a bar or graph). 3. Select the cryptocurrency you want to cancel the open order for. 4. Tap the Orders tab at the bottom left of the screen. 5. Scroll through your list of open orders and tap the three dots to the right of the order you want to cancel. 6. Tap the trash can icon labeled Cancel Order. 7. On the confirmation screen, tap Yes, Cancel Order to complete the cancellation.
